peopleAlsoAsk.question: How do I find the value of rare coins?
peopleAlsoAsk.snippet: Reputable coin dealers, Coin Auctions, eBay, and Price Guides are great places to start. If your coins are graded by one of the Top Tier grading services like PCGS or NGC, you can usually get a reasonable value estimate sight-unseen!
peopleAlsoAsk.title: How do I find out what my old coins are worth? | Investor Education

peopleAlsoAsk.question: How do you get coins appraised without getting ripped off?
peopleAlsoAsk.snippet: - Look up general information about your coins to get a rough idea of their value. Websites like NGC (Numismatic Guaranty Corporation) and PCGS (Professional Coin Grading Service) provide price guides and grading information. - Coin catalogs and price guides (eg, the Red Book) can also provide valuable information.
